website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re working in the garden, working away in your shop, or enjoying an outdoor event, this soft, foldable mat can save your knees and back from hard or rough surfaces.
pros: Constructed from high-density impact-resistant EVA foam, this folding mat provides excellent cushioning from rocks, concrete, or hard soil
The folding design allows you to stack each section for maximum comfort or spread it out for multiple people
Material is resistant to water and fuel and cleans easily
cons: Connective webbing creates gaps between padded sections, which can present issues if multiple people want to use it
Webbing can also wear out over time

customer_reviews.title: Provides great cushion, but plastic webbing between mat sections is already wearing out
customer_reviews.text: This mat is really, really nice for old knees and backs. I love the idea it can be folded flat or stacked. The mat portions are solid enough to protect knees from rocks and hard soil, yet have enough "give" to be comfortable. The complaint I have is the plastic webbing between the mat portions; we've used this for less than a month, and the webbing is starting to wear badly. Duct tape will fix it, and it's still too useful to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, very comfortable to use, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mat to use when hooking up my vehicle on a tow dolly behind my RV. This allows me to get down on my old knees very comfortably, and then lay down to connect the safety chains without wallowing around on the pavement and getting my clothes dirty. I'm certain I will find many uses for this great pad, but for now, it's my go-to tool for anything I have to do on the ground!
customer_reviews.author: G Tobey

customer_reviews.text: This is a very small and narrow pad. Also very thin. Looks nothing like the pictures and there are gaps between each pad when you unfold it. Doubt that it would hold up to being on the ground very many times.

product_meta.title: ABN Foldable Garage or Gardening Kneeling Mat EVA Foam - Anti-Fatigue Mat, Seat Cushion, or Stool, Water Resistant
feature_bullets: MAKE YOUR WORK COMFORTABLE: The ABN Foam Kneeling Pad for Gardening Knee Pads for Cleaning, Mechanic Kneeling Pad is a knee cushion for kneeling, laying, or sitting on any surface; 6 knee mat sections have the perfect amount of firmness and softness to protect knees from painful concrete, rocks, and hard soil yet offer extra support and comfort

USE ANYWHERE: Whether you are in the shop or garage, out in the yard gardening, or going to an outdoor event such as a ball game, you can easily convert this foldable 3-in-1 garden kneeler pad into a comfortable and supportive knee pad mat or laying mat for automotive work, seat cushion to avoid hard bleachers, or stool alternative seating

ADJUST TO THE PERFECT SIZE: 47.5” x 16.5” x 1.25” inch (120.7cm x 41.9cm x 3.2cm) overall dimensions with 6 foam sections that allow the gardening knee pad cushion to lay flat, be folded in half, or stacked in thirds so you can find the perfect fit for your application

BUILT TO LAST: Constructed from high-density ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer (EVA) foam that is resists water and impact as well as chemical, oil, and fuel spills or splashes which makes this gardening pad kneeler easy to clean; Thick foam pad remains durable yet flexible even at low-temperatures, retains resistance to UV radiation and stress-cracking, and quickly recovers from compressions
EASY STORAGE: Kneeling cushion pad includes 6 sections that fold for compact storage and has a conveniently built-in handle to carry from one project to the next
